originalText.text: This place has gone from bad to worse. They are very irresponsible, unprofessional, treatment to the children unacceptable. There has been so many incidents that have happened and no one there seems to be able to do anything as they are very incompetent. Horrible place to bring your children to.

originalText.text: Best center ever! I'm so greatful and pleased with how much my son has learn. I have no complaints, they take great care of my son. Thanks to his teachers Noris, Jenny and Rosa for taking such a good care of my son and making him feel like at home!

originalText.text:
would not recommend this day care to any mother with a toddler child. I pulled my 2 year old daughter out of Rena Day Care after waiting 6 weeks for an approval because of how inadequate and incompetent the teachers were. Not only were they late on a regular basis they were also more concerned with leaving home early than with the care of my child.

On one occasion I found my daughter with a bruised lip and the teacher had no idea how she got it. The next day the other teacher said she hit herself with the plastic beds they sleep on. On another occasion I found her with dry blood on her nose. The teacher said she had a nose bleed needless to say having the courtesy to wipe her nose was out of the question.

My daughter adapted to her new day care immediately which only proves my suspicions that she was not being cared for as she should have been.

I hope this is helpful to any working parent.

All the best!
